span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 迷恋： a strong and continued inclination
【例】 a penchant for Champaign 非常喜爱香槟
【近】 affection, bias, disposition, leaning, partiality, predilection, predisposition, proclivity, propensity, tendency
【反】 aversion, disfavor, disinclination, dislike, distaste, loathing, repugnance, repulsion 反感
【记】 pen 笔，写东西，写作 + chant 音乐，唱歌→写作与音乐是我的最大爱好
